thread.title: Ant & Dec lead celebrity line-up at Saturday Night Takeaway-themed charity ball
thread.title_full: Ant & Dec lead celebrity line-up at Saturday Night Takeaway-themed charity ball

title: Ant & Dec lead celebrity line-up at Saturday Night Takeaway-themed charity ball
text:
Ant & Dec lead celebrity line-up at Saturday Night Takeaway-themed charity ball Ant & Dec lead celebrity line-up at Saturday Night Takeaway-themed charity ball 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Ant & Dec were joined by a host of famous faces from the world of TV and sport at this year’s ChildLine Ball. 
British boxer David Hayes, BBC presenter Clare Balding and Dame Esther Rantzen led the celebrity line-up at the charity event in London. 
The Saturday Night Takeaway-themed gala was hosted by the Tyneside duo, who are long-time supporters of the children’s charity. The Geordie jokers hosted the event (Ian West/PA) 
The pair said: “We’ve been big supporters of ChildLine over the years and wanted to do something extra special this year which is why we’re bringing Saturday Night Takeaway to The ChildLine Ball. 
“Every child should have someone to turn to when times are tough, and that’s where ChildLine’s amazing counsellors come in, making sure children all over the UK have someone to talk to about their problems. We’re delighted to be able to support such a worthy cause.” Heavyweight boxer David Hayes (Ian West/PA) 
Guests were treated to a champagne reception followed by a three-course dinner and an evening of entertainment at the sell-out event. Dame Esther Rantzen (Ian West/PA) 
To secure a table of 10, guests had to pay £6,000, with a table of 12 costing £7,200. Presenter Jeff Brazier (Ian West/PA) Taking @itvtakeaway to the @NSPCC #ChildLine Ball tonight. Can't wait! Get in early with the auction and bid bid bid! http://t.co/PMM1H7wQDY
